rows.label: bf01170100_0010
rows.name:
Your target is located inside a
shipwreck 450 melts straight down.

rows.label: bf01170100_0020
rows.name:
Searching the wreck while submerged is
too high-risk for our tastes, so...

rows.label: bf01170100_0030
rows.name:
we'll be using flotation devices
and cranes to lift the hull first.

rows.label: bf01170100_0040
rows.name:
Next, you'll split into teams and explore the interior.
Once the target is found, retrieval can commence.

rows.label: bf01170100_0050
rows.name:
If that's clear, let's begin with
attaching the floats. Get into position!

rows.label: bf01170100_0060
rows.name:
We're paying you a lot,
so don't screw it up!
